title: Dr. B
content: Hi! I’m Dr. B, and I’m here to introduce you to your mission.

title: Dr. B
content: You are here to help us get rid of the cancer in the patient’s breast.

title: Dr. B
content: Radiotherapy is one of the ways we can utilize to deal with cancer, but this time we will be leaving the reins to you. You will be sent in to deal with it directly.

title: Dr. B
content: Soon your mission will begin. Remember: Breast cancer is a real bitch.

title: Dr. B
content: Use WASD or arrow keys to move around in the environment. The primary mouse button will let you shoot the laser at the cancerous cells in your path.

title: Dr. B
content: If you need to take a break, [Escape button] will let you pause the mission. Good luck!
